DOC.brief_summary: Resting metabolic rate ( RMR ) decline 1-2 % per decade 20 year age . This reduction link decrease fat free mass ( FFM ) ( 10-20 % ) rate energy expenditure tissue ( Manini 2010 ) . It also show age : - Concomitant reduction basal fat carbohydrate oxidation , likely due decrease RMR change respiratory exchange ratio ( RER ) ( St-Onge Gallagher 2010 ) . - A change towards saturate membrane different tissue ( Rabini et al 2002 ) . Incorporation omega-3s , eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) , cell membrane may alter energy metabolism : - Increasing rate protein operate ( Hulbert 2007 ) . - Promoting release EPA DHA cytosol act ligands peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor ( PPARs ) ( Calder 2011 ) . PPARs play important role energy homeostasis regulate gene involve lipid metabolism ( Kota et al 2005 ) . - Augmenting protein synthesis activation mTOR-p70s6k pathway ( Di Girolamo et al 2014 ) . Supplementation fish oil old male female : - Increases whole muscle phospholipid profile EPA DHA ( Smith et al 2011 ) . - Increases lean body mass ( LBM ) , RMR , fatty acid oxidation ( Logan et al unpublished ) - Decreases carbohydrate oxidation ( Logan et al unplubished ) . Skeletal muscle ( SM ) account 20-30 % RMR ( Zurlo et al 1990 , Manini 2010 ) , therefore tempt speculate change may occur mechanism describe earlier , skeletal muscle important contributor . To date study examine effect n-3 supplementation ( 3g/day ) * plasma membrane fatty acid composition , RMR substrate oxidation , possible mechanism behind . Therefore purpose study determine whether old adult ( female male ) , supplementation n-3 alters : 1 . RMR fatty acid oxidation . 2 . Membrane composition whole muscle sarcolemma . 3 . Content skeletal muscle membrane fatty acid transport protein . 4 . Dose response NaKATPase 5 . Content mitochondrial protein 6 . DOC.brief_title: Effect Fish Oil Supplementation Resting Energy Expenditure , Skeletal Muscle Membrane Composition Metabolism Elderly Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Between 60 75 year old Must currently practice consistent diet exercise regimen , maintain throughout duration study Have medical condition ( evidence significant cardiovascular disease organ dysfunction , include hypertension , dyslipidemia , diabetes mellitus ) , hospitalization surgery Consume two meal fish/wk and/or take omega3 supplement prior three month . Have BMI > 30 kg/m2
